---------- Forwarded message ----------
From: Mahesh Khurpe <Mahes.Khurpe@xoriant.com>
Date: Wed, Aug 31, 2016 at 9:41 AM
Subject: CTF Engineering Lead - Menlo Park, CA
To: uRA sumA <%FORWARDER%>


Hi uRA,


This is *Mahesh *from *Xoriant Corporation *writing you in regards to the
position below. I would appreciate if you can have a look and let me know
if interested:

*I also wanted to apologize in advance if you aren't the right person I
should be Contacting.*


*Job Title:             CTF Engineering Lead*

*Location:             Menlo Park, CA *

*Duration:             12+ Months *



*Responsibilities*

   - Define and drive CTF product development roadmap
   - Execute on product roadmap
   - Maintain established SLA in engaging with and closing out filed Github
   issues
   - Manage CTF email alias, respond to any incoming requests or issues
   - Establish and maintain relationships with strategic partners,
   including tier one universities, organizations, and conferences as to
   increase the exposure and use FBCTF.

*Skills:    Requirements*

   - Experience developing * responsive* *web* * applications*
   - Minimum 3 years experience as *software engineer*, or other applicable
   experience
   - Solid understanding of the *full web technology stack* (*Javascript,
   MySQL,* etc.)
   - Experience with * PHP* preferred (*Hack* * experience* is ideal)
   - *Data-informed product development*: analytics, A/B testing, etc.
   - Must be a self-starter and enjoy full ownership over the external
   product
   - Experience playing in or hosting Capture The Flag competitions a plus
   - Experience and understanding of* information security* a plus

*Thanks & regards,*

*Mahesh Khurpe | Xoriant Connect   *

*http://www.xoriantconnect.com <http://www.xoriantconnect.com/> *

W: 408-550-1251

1248, Reamwood Ave, Sunnyvale, CA 94089

Find us on: *[image: Description: Description: Description:
cid:image001.png@01D1237F.273CF4A0]* <http://www.xoriantconnect.com/>  *[im=
